root.name: Elfmania
root.description: OVERVIEWElfmania is set in the mythical land of Muhmulandia a land of elves. The player can became the ruler of the elven kingdom by defeating the king in an Honour Fight. The player also stands to win the Dragon Fan, a mystical object which bestows the secrets of the universe upon its owner.

similar_games.game: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior
